scripts.nuke: docker stop graphql-docker && docker rm graphql-docker && docker volume rm -f pgdata && prisma rm -rf prisma/migration
scripts.launchDocker: docker run --name graphql-docker -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=iwYwBmMP5590 -dp 5432:5432 -v pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:latest
scripts.resetDB: heroku restart && heroku pg:reset DATABASE_URL --confirm manga-graphql3 && heroku run rake db:migrate && heroku run rake db:seed
